• Manage a global program for Hong Kong and Taiwan

• Able to work full-time for 6 months before graduation
• Master students from Business, science and engineering schools

• Excellent communication and inter-personal skills, strong team player
• Willing to work in a fast-paced working environment
• Strong command of English in both verbal and writing
【Preferred Qualifications】
• Experience in branding, marketing and business development
• Leadership experience in campus society or external society
• Overseas experience
